EmailTemplate.subject: Hang with Kumail Nanjiani at Turbofest Silicon Valley | Guarantee Your Seat Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}: We are thrilled to announce that Kumail Nanjiani from HBOâ€™s hit show, Silicon Valley will be our celebrity comedian performing the evening of 3/9/16 at the AWS Pop Up Loft in San Francisco!
Turbofest is a FREE opportunity for you to learn from VMTurbo and its technology partners about the next generation of cloud and virtualization. It features customer success keynotes, product sneak previews, and partner & analyst presentations. It is a chance to network with your peers, explore the next wave of IT innovation, and meet some of the brightest engineers in the world.
GUARANTEE YOUR SEAT TODAY <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-silicon-valley?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV-Wide-Net&utm_content=02102016]]> as Turbofest Silicon Valley is limited to the first 100 VIP registrants!
#VMTurbofest
